channel.title: [PI] items kept on death

item.title: [PI] items kept on death
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

So whenever I open the items kept on death interface, I get this. I searched all over but I can’t find a solution.

i7937t.png771×502

also, here’s the case 113237 that handles the interface opening.

[code]case 113237:

		if(!c.isSkulled) {	
			c.getItems().resetKeepItems();
			c.getItems().keepItem(0, false);
			c.getItems().keepItem(1, false);	
			c.getItems().keepItem(2, false);
			c.getItems().keepItem(3, false);
			c.sendMessage("You can keep three items and a fourth if you use the protect item prayer.");
		} else {
			c.getItems().resetKeepItems();
			c.getItems().keepItem(0, false);
			c.sendMessage("You are skulled and will only keep one item if you use the protect item prayer.");
		}
		c.getPA().showInterface(17100);
                    c.getItems().sendItemsKept();
		c.getItems().resetKeepItems();
		break;[/code]

Read full topic
